Friendly Heating Reminder for Residents üåü
üî• As the chilly season approaches, we're dedicated to ensuring your comfort and safety. When you activate your heating system for the first time, you might detect a faint burning aroma, possibly even causing your smoke detectors to stir. But fear not, for this is merely a passing occurrence that requires no cause for alarm. üî•
Here's the scoop: While this may initially set off your smoke detectors, rest assured, it's an ordinary part of the process and will cease once it's done its job.
üè° Remember, this is a routine when you fire up your heating system for the season. Should you have any lingering concerns or questions, please contact us.
üôè We wholeheartedly appreciate your understanding and cooperation. Stay warm and snug! üôè
Sara - Property Manager
